title: TAP - a Gastropub
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Some items can be made Vegan (mostly side items) and still are clearly marked on the menu. Chips and salsa can be vegan without the cheese. No longer offers vegan desserts. Some ingredients on the menu are organic. Atmosphere is modern bar, casual dress code. Wi-fi, beer bar, live music Fridays, trivia Tuesdays. Note: Reported that fries are fried in same frier as fish, please confirm and inform HappyCow.
